abstract: ed on Goebbel's warning to neutrals
snippet: That pellucid thinker, that good, gentle, tolerant, easygoing statesman Herr Doktor Joseph Goebbels, the Nazi Minister of Enlightenment and Propaganda, has just read the neutral countries another lecture....
lead_paragraph: That pellucid thinker, that good, gentle, tolerant, easygoing statesman Herr Doktor Joseph Goebbels, the Nazi Minister of Enlightenment and Propaganda, has just read the neutral countries another lecture.
